words.source: Conjunction vav + masculine singular construct of kol (all, every)
Definite article + feminine singular noun eretz (earth, land, country); KJV, ESV, NASB, NIV
Qal perfect 3rd masculine plural of bo (to come, enter); KJV, ESV, NASB, NIV
Proper noun Mitzrayim (Egypt) with directional he suffix; KJV, ESV, NASB, NIV
Preposition le + Qal infinitive construct of shavar (to break, buy grain); KJV, ESV, NASB, NIV
Preposition el (to, toward, from in context of commercial transaction); KJV, ESV, NASB, NIV
Proper noun Yosef (Joseph); KJV, ESV, NASB, NIV
Causal conjunction ki (because, for, that); KJV, ESV, NASB, NIV
Qal perfect 3rd masculine singular of chazaq (to be strong, severe); KJV, ESV, NASB, NIV
Definite article + masculine singular noun raav (famine, hunger); KJV, ESV, NASB, NIV
Preposition be + masculine singular construct of kol (all, every)
Definite article + feminine singular noun eretz (earth, land, country); KJV, ESV, NASB, NIV
